Title: Managerial Economics
Author: এইচ. এল আহুজা
Summary:
This book is especially prepared for MBA, PGDM, M.COM, MFC and other equivalent courses as per the UGC Model Curriculum. This book presents in -depth analysis of topics.

This book presents in-depth analysis of topics.*

    This edition explains the crucial role of capital formation in economic growth and the factors that determine it.*
    This book makes exhaustive study of managerial and behavioral models of the firm and managerial decision making under risk and uncertainty.*
    We have incorporated in the present book both the micro and macro-economic aspects of managerial economics.


Table of Contents

Part 1: Managerial Economics: Nature, Scope And Optimization Techniques
Part 2: Demand Analysis And Theory Of Consumer’s Choice
Part 3: Theory Of Production And Cost Analysis
Part 4: Price And Output Decisions In Various Market Structures
Part 5: Pricing Practices And Strategies
Part 6: Capital Budgeting And Decision Making Under Risk And Uncertainty
Part 7: Macroeconomics For Management
